challenges.name: Wait for It (Confluxes)
challenges.description: Every yellow-bar Wyvern must be killed as they are sacrificing themselves to the confluxes

challenges.name: The Only Oracle for You (Oracles)
challenges.description: Players cannot destroy the same oracle more than once.

challenges.name: Strangers In Time (Gatekeeper)
challenges.description: Players must defeat the Praetorian and Wyvern at the same time.

challenges.name: Ensemble's Refrain (Atheon)
challenges.description: Each player teleported can only destroy one oracle in each spawn set.
